DOC.brief_title: Inpatient Blood Glucose Control in Taichung Veterans General Hospital
DOC.detailed_description: This study will be conducted in the ward of Taichung Veterans General Hospital. The type 2 diabetic patient with hyperglycemia in hospitalization are candidates. The glucose will be controlled using the insulin protocal based on the glucose monitor systems. We will assess the effects of insulin protocal and glucose monitor system on the inpatient with hyperglycemia.
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic inpatient Fasting glucose >140 mg/dl or random glucose >180 mg/dl incooperative for glucose monitor refusal of insulin pregnancy
